We are soon to reach our One Year anniversary here at the SHQ. At 
this point it would be appropriate to hear from you, the Shinsengumi 
fans, and find out if the SHQ is living up to your expectations. 
Please take a moment to answer the questions in the "Polls" section 
and tell us what you truly feel about the SHQ.

Thank you.

-MissB
